channel.title: FCPA on Mahonri Manjarrez (non-official website)
channel.description: Recent content in FCPA on Mahonri Manjarrez (non-official website)

item.title: Email sent on 2022-12-29 to the F.B.I. to ask who is the case agent in charge of the case targeting McDonald’s Corporation.
item.description:
From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court)

To: [Mr. Manjarrez’s username]@fbi.gov

Cc: Edward Lehman, Muyi Xiao, Kevin Granville (NYTimes), Constant Méheut, David Enrich (NYTimes), Michael Forsythe (NYTimes)

Bcc: Yves Strickler

Subject: Who is the case agent in charge of the criminal investigation?

Date sent: 2022-12-29 at 01:17 Beijing time (+0800)

item.title: Email sent on 2022-12-28 to the F.B.I.
item.description:
On 2022-12-28, I sent an email to the F.B.I.

From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court)

To: [Mr. Rogalski’s username]@state.gov, [Mr. Manjarrez’s username]@fbi.gov

Cc: Edward Lehman, Muyi Xiao, Kevin Granville (NYTimes), Constant Méheut, David Enrich (NYTimes), Michael Forsythe (NYTimes)

Bcc: Yves Strickler

Subject: NEW REFERENCE: USA-v-McDonalds-pattern-of-racketeering-activity

Date sent: 2022-12-28 at 14:49 Beijing time (+0800)
